content.p: Find the first 5 terms of the following sequence: a_n={{Formula}}.

content.p: Find a recursive form for the following sequence: {{t0}}, {{t1}}, {{t2}}, {{t3}}, {{t4}},\ldots

outtro.p: Answers can vary depending on your choice of starting index. For example, if a_0={{t0}} then a_n={{c}}\cdot a_{n-1}+{{tail}}.
